phrases: Happily, painfully...
You are shining.
Glittering, shimmering...
Is she analyzing the Gullfinger wavelength of the stars?
Hoshimi-sama, who usually does not say anything, spoke.
That in itself says volumes about the situation.
Indignation, compassion...
Where are you going?
Abnormal behavior exhibited by the astronomer in charge of special duties was also observed five years ago,
prior to the disappearance of South America.
Various intelligence agencies within the city have also taken the serial bombings into consideration and are at full alert.
Since these events have occurred before the upcoming solar maximum,
one could say that the current situation may be the prelude to a tragic scenario.
As of 5 P.M. today, the Tokyo Metropolitan government has issued special security measures,
including the implementation of a night curfew, for residents living in certain areas of the city.
These measures are to ensure the safety of the city's residents in light of the recent terrorist attacks.
Areas subject to these...
Your sleeping face is cute.
I have been trying to get Yin to locate Amber, but I lost contact with her.
When I came here to check things out...
What is wrong?
Amber!
Hei!
Hop in.
You are in a rush, are not you?
Hoshimi-sama?
Although a gag order's in effect,
I wanted you to know, Misaki.
I sent you a list of the stars that were active during the explosions.
Were contractors involved?
Was not it a series of retaliatory attacks between intelligence agencies?
Information was leaked down to us.
I do not believe that people who make their living in the underworld would resort to such a conspicuous method.
Could it be...
Why did Amber take Yin?
I heard that you and her were on the same team in South America until she left the syndicate.
What happened between you two?
Stop the car.
You are going the wrong way!
Misaki...
What is it?
November...
If anything happens...
Police...
Misaki's place...
What happened to him?
He did not come back.
Do you know where he went?
I always know where my partners are.
Tell me along the way.
Partner?
Nice to meet you.
Good morning.
Good afternoon.
Good evening.
Good night.
Thank you.
No need to rush.
Take your time.
It would not be my remuneration if the milk was not hot.
Sorry to interrupt your conversation,
but would you mind if I had a cigarette?
They are in my left suit pocket.
I am not allowed to make physical contact with you.
You are an excellent contractor.
You were able to avoid the scorching heat by making a split-second decision.
I would appreciate a smoke more than a compliment.
Did you know that cigarette smoke is more hazardous to those around the smoker?
The amount of the carcinogen dimethylnitrosamine present in direct smoke is between 5.3 and 43 nanograms,
while there are between 680...
I already know that.
I have always wanted to see what happens to a contractor who does not complete his remuneration.
Do they really melt like butter?
I am kidding.
There was a vending machine on the street.
Nice to meet you.
Good morning.
What an admirable young man,
managing to study whenever you are not bombing buildings.
It gives me a strange feeling for some reason.
Amber taught me.
At first, I thought it was pointless.
You cannot reach out to people with mere words since they are just enumerations of syllables,
but Amber said that was not true.
I am studying every day because Amber told me to.
I would do anything for Amber's sake.
I would even destroy this city.
Anything.
You will have to sit still for a while.
Those were orders from above.
I cannot let you meet Amber.
Do not screw around with me!
Hey, Huang!
It is nothing personal.
It is not like I want to do this,
but it is partly your fault for constantly not listening to me.
I will kill you if you get in my way.
You are the one who is going to die if you do not follow the syndicate's orders.
Do not make me do it.
Huang, do not!
Alley cats should shut the fuck up!
Do not do it, Hei!
Episode Sixteen
Memories of Betrayal
in an Amber Smile...
(Part Two)
Hey, can I ask you something?
Why would a contractor like you work for human beings?
We are the chosen ones.
They are afraid of us because they cannot sign contracts,
which makes sense.
An existence with newly acquired powers has emerged.
An existence fit to establish a new world order.
Is that part of Amber's manifesto?
Amber would not say something like that.
I was told that the tragedy that took place in South America had to be repeated in this city.
Why?
I do not know,
but it must be important since Amber was the one who said it.
You would probably understand.
The reason for our group's conception and course of action.
We, the Evening Primrose, invite you.
Come with us.
What kind of benefits do I receive if I join your little club?
The future.
In your situation, you do not have much of a choice.
Decide rationally, November 11.
Oh, pardon me.
I just remembered saying the same thing to a certain contractor.
What do you think he did?
He attacked me with everything he had,
even though he only had a slight chance to win.
I could not rationalize why a contractor like that would exist.
His train of thought and principles of life...
The more I thought about it, the more I became confused.
How touching.
Are you going to follow his example?
No, I take pride in being a contractor.
That is why I have come to a rational decision.
What is that?
I refuse.
Freeze!
Do not move!
Slowly put your hands behind your head.
You are like a knight in shining armor, Misaki.
Who are they?
The ones responsible for the explosions.
I am glad you are not hurt.
Your partner led me here.
Partner?
Yes, July-kun.
You will definitely come to us.
You will definitely seek us out.
Shining across the Milky Way...
Yearning, yet distraught.
If that is what fate has decided, I will not hinder you.
Nobody will.
I could not make him join us.
I have to apologize.
Where is Amber?
I already told you.
She is waiting for the final key.
Who could she be waiting for while leaving me behind?
Is it someone that important?
Maybe...
There is no need for you to know.
Tell me!
I will tell her what happened.
Head to the second meeting point.
Got it?
That was an order from Amber.
There was one time when he actually laughed from the bottom of his heart.
His sweet smile captivated me.
That is when I thought to myself,
You really did it this time.
I felt as if I could do anything for him.
I would do anything to see that smile again...
I am sure you feel the same way.
Me?
Yes.
Look after him, okay?
Li-san?
What happened to you?
Where are you going?
If you are going that way...
You must be the one called Hei.
Amber always talks about you.
Thank you.
It was the first time I was able to say it without thinking.
That is why I was happy,
but I am not anymore.
This is what you would call jealousy, is not it?
Amber always talks about you.
That is why I will not let you through.
I said I will not let you see her!
I forgot to tell you something.
Good boys should not be up this late.
Get out of my way!
Go after the man who ran away.
That ability...
He is the contractor you are looking for.
But...
I have to teach that mischievous boy a lesson.
Do not worry.
July's by my side.
Hurry, Misaki.
Come on.
If you want to fight me that badly,
come and get me!
Prints.
They are everywhere.
I set traps on everything you are capable of freezing.
You will not be able to attack me.
Come and get me if you can.
You are supposed to be an excellent contractor, are not you?
I do not need you, Hei, or Amagiri.
I am the contractor best suited for Amber.
But...
Show me!
Prove that you are stronger than I am!
We can do it.
See?
I am far better than he is.
You do not need anyone else, do you?
I am the best, are not I?
Is not that right, Amber?
He will be here soon.
See?
Are you hurt?
Let me see!
You have grown, Hei.
I do not have any intention of forgiving a traitor.
Before I kill you, there is something I need to ask.
What happened during that incident?
Where did my sister go?
Do not you have anything to say before that?
Like it is been a while,
or you look as pretty as ever.
Answer me, Amber!
Do you want to see Pai?
Should I take you to her?
Where is she?
Somewhere far, yet really close.
Come with me, Hei.
If you do, I will take you to her,
but the city lights might vanish.
What are you going to do, Hei?
Do not screw around with me.
Freeze!
No...
Move, Amber!
Hei, I have traveled very far,
even across the plane of time.
I wanted to see you ever since that day.
Always, always...
I have always wanted to see you.
See you later.
Let us go.
There is a limit on your remuneration, so use it wisely!
Was not that the right time to use it?
Star-sama, do not fear.
It is not yet time to radiate.
Your time will come.
How did everything go?
I was able to split the enemy lines, at least.
All we need to do is wait.
Are you sure we need that man?
Yes, if we want the Evening Primrose to reach full bloom.
Maki should have arrived before I did.
No, he will not be coming.
I do not like that word because it makes me feel lonely,
but I have to say good-bye properly.
Amber...
What is this?
Revenge on my behalf?
That is not funny.
Neither was your joke.
Huang, are you alive?
Yeah.
It looks like I am the one with nine lives.
Did he hold back?
A contractor like him, fucking around with me...
Suddenly, you realize that what was thought to be unattainable
is close at hand.
But it is a happiness not destined for you.
Serenity and trivial conversation.
Being both happy and sad over petty things,
crying over concerns not worth bothering with.
Too sullied to live in such a manner.
And then, you understand that those days will not go on.
Episode Seventeen A Love Song Sung from a Trash Heap... (Part One)
